The SQL Server BI world has been kind of static for a long time, now they’re bringing out a funky new platform and they’re putting R everywhere. This hands-on pre-con will take you through the fundamentals of working with R and then show how it can easily be integrated into the Microsoft stack.

## Contents
- [R + Microsoft](RMicrosoft.html)
- [Getting started with R](GettingStarted.html)
- [Data manipulation fundamentals](DataManipulation.html)
- [Data visualisation basics](DataViz.html)
- [Getting data from SQL Server into R](SQLServerFromR.html)
- [Using R in SQL Server](RFromSQLServer.html)
- [Making predictions with R & Azure ML](AzureML.html)
- High end dashboards with PowerBI & R

## Objectives
- Knowing enough R to comfortably do basic data analysis
- Understand how R impacts the new Data Platform
- Practical experience of working with R in the Data Platform

## Prerequisites
Attendees should be comfortable writing SQL and will ideally having coded a bit in other languages previously. Attendees will need a laptop with the necessary software installed. They should follow the [installation instructions](Installation.html) to get everything configured.
